name: #ExtinctAnimals No.02 The Last Quagga (mp4)
description:
Equus quagga quagga. Extinct. Anthropocene. South Africa. 

“The Quagga were reported to have gathered in herds of 30 to 50, sometimes traveling in a linear fashion over the arid Karoo plains.” 


#ExtinctAnimals is a collection of pixelated fauna representing the last specimens of species that disappeared from earth. Bright pixels, fossil records and genetic descendants are all we have left. As an NFT, each of these images is unique, finite, and scarce -- much like the last extinct animals they depict.
